name: Spring Didn't Come
description:
This is a game I made for the Great Spring Jam.

I ran out of time so the game isn't as fleshed out as I planned. But I hope you like it anyways.

The Idea came from the Idea generator for the jam.
It gave me winter as the theme to make a game around.

-------------------------Story---------------------------

The winter crystal has caused for spring to not come. As Dr. of Botany and Organic Chemistry Dr. Carl Wimmit, find the Crystal and stop its control over the local flora to bring back spring.

----------------------How to Play----------------------

Use WASD or The Arrow Keys to move and Z/U to shoot

----------------------Cradit-----------------------------

Everything Was done by Me except for the engine.(I used Godot)
